ACKAY.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising TVs, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brand names. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of KoÃ§ Holding A.S.

ALCTL.IS.summary: Alcatel Lucent Teletas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. produces and sells telecommunication equipment in Turkey. The company operates in three segments: IP/Optical/Mobile Network, Fixed Network, and Application & Analytics. It primarily offers telephone exchanges and transmission devices. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARCLK.IS.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising TVs, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brand names. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of KoÃ§ Holding A.S.

ARDYZ.IS.long_name: ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi
ARDYZ.IS.summary: ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri A.S. provides software solutions in Turkey. Its software solutions include e-Invoice, a solution for preparation and sharing of invoices used in enterprises in a digital environment; e-Archive that allows to store, submit, and report invoices in electronic media; national law software solutions; cloud solutions; cyber security software and systems; and SAP solutions, including SAP ERP, business analytics, mobile, and CRM solutions. The company also offers enterprise software solutions comprising corporate information management systems, corporate identity and access management systems, enterprise equipment tracking systems, e-government projects, RFID-based software and integration solutions, vehicle tracking and security control systems, logistic warehouse and container tracking systems, textile tracking and process management solutions, and social media tracking systems, as well as staff, visitor, and person tracking systems. In addition, it offers health system solutions consisting of sterilization tracking systems, patient tracking and baby tracking systems, hospital textile tracking systems, hospital fixtures and medical equipment tracking systems, and hospital warehouse tracking systems. Further, the company offers system solutions, including cyber security solutions, information system solutions, command center and security solutions, and smart technology solutions. ARD Grup Bilisim Teknolojileri A.S. was founded in 2011 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

ARENA.IS.long_name: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARENA.IS.summary: Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology in Turkey. The company offers computing materials, international trade, and Internet electronic retailing and marketing, as well as provides electronic security product trading, payment brokerage, and location management services. It is also involved in wholesale trading of telecommunication product, such as mobile phones and other mobile devices. Arena Bilgisayar Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ARMDA.IS.long_name: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARMDA.IS.summary: Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a distributor in the information technology sector in Turkey. It offers IT products and solutions to end users through business partners. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Armada Bilgisayar Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Aptec Holdings Limited.

ARZUM.IS.long_name: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ARZUM.IS.summary: Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS engages in the manufacture and supply of household appliances for households worldwide. It offers food preparation, cooking, frying, beverage preparation, cleaning, personal care, iron, baby products, day gifts, and accessories. The company sells its products through authorized retail points. Arzum Elektrikli Ev Aletleri San. ve Tic. AS was formerly known as Guney Ithalat Kollektif Sirketi. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey with additional offices in Hong Kong and Turkey.

DESPC.IS.long_name: Despec Bilgisayar Pazarlama ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
DESPC.IS.summary: Despec Bilgisayar Pazarlama ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi distributes ICT consumables in Turkey and internationally. The company distributes laser toners and accessories, and ink cartridges; magnetic media products, such as data cartridges and optical media products; printer ribbons; and photo, continuous form, inkjet, laserjet, deskjet, and plotter papers, as well as fax rolls and labels. It also distributes accessories consisting of mouse, speakers, game consoles, keyboards, adapters, cables, storage and carrying boxes, and cleaning materials; and wholesales computer consumables, and mobiles. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ESCOM.IS.summary: Escort Teknoloji Yatirim A.S. provides technology products, solutions, and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers including consumer electronics, including tablets, notebooks, cameras, external storage products, LCD and LED TVs, Blu-ray and DVD players, LED lighting products, sound systems, and projection devices. It also provides military systems, such as atom processor military computers; unmanned aerial vehicle communication, control, and image compression systems; ruggedized DVD and laser printers; laser threat warning receiver systems; power systems; regulators; and AC/DC laboratory power systems. In addition, the company offers image processing systems; retail payment systems; and telecommunications and network systems comprising modems, routers and switches, switching systems, and data and power distribution systems, as well as provides network solutions and banking systems. Further, it provides various solutions that include automation, channel management system, merchandising management system, warehouse management system, service management system, E-invoice sending/receiving, archiving of e-invoice, SMS gateway, call center solutions, IVR and IVN solutions, voice over Internet protocol, data center, Internet service provider, and virtual telephone solutions. Additionally, the company offers live support; social media monitoring, analysis, and technology supply; inbound and outbound call center customer, telesales and telemarketing, collections and payment reminders, customer satisfaction surveys, information calls, technical support, and back office; football statistics and analysis; media monitoring and reporting; merchandising management; and TV screen graphics software and operation services. It also provides consulting, planning, design, installation, maintenance, and repair services for renewable energy systems. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

IHEVA.IS.long_name: Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
IHEVA.IS.summary: Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells small home appliances. It offers cleaning robots, water heaters, water purifiers, carpet washing machine, tea-maker, vacuum cleaners shampooers, and vacuum cleaners under Aura, Aura Cleanmax, Aura Roboclean, Aura Cebilon, Aura QVac, Aura Livac, and Aura Wdry brands. The company sells its products through dealer networks and distributors. Ihlas Ev Aletleri Imalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

INDES.IS.long_name: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri Mühendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
INDES.IS.summary: Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, through its subsidiaries, distributes information technology products in Turkey. The company's product portfolio includes PC, notebook, server, peripherals, software, and OEM products; and CPU, hard disks, mother boards, VGA cards, monitors, optical products, memory products, laser printers, and backup hardware products, as well as security products. It also offers consumables, moveable data storage media, accessories, and papers; and corporate network systems, structural network components, cable products, corporate telephone systems, and network security and ADSL communication solutions, as well as logistics and transportation services. The company distributes its products through a network of system integrators, value added dealers, and regular dealers, as well as retail channels, including retail chain, regular computer stores, and e-retail. Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KAREL.IS.long_name: Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
KAREL.IS.summary: Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. designs, develops, produces, and sells wired or wireless communication systems in Turkey. It offers communication products, such as PBX phone systems for small, medium, and large scale businesses; IP based call center systems for public and private institutions; and IP, analog, wall, hotel, and feature phones, as well as direct station select modules, and operator phone headsets. The company also provides convergence and integration products, including conference products, GSM terminals, wireless (DECT) systems, auto-attendant and voicemail modules, call traffic control systems, VoIP and network products, call recording systems, nurse call systems, and other products, as well as vehicle tracking systems. In addition, it offers visual communication and security systems comprising security camera systems, intruder alarm systems, and intercom systems; cloud solutions with Internet applications that facilitate the business processes, and provide economy and productivity for corporate users; and electronics manufacturing services, as well as undertakes telecommunication and defense industry projects. The company provides its communication solutions for transportation sector, hotels and touristic facilities, public institutions, hospitals and medical institutions, universities and educational institutions, factories and industrial production facilities, merchandising and retail business, banks, leasing and factoring companies, equity houses, and other financial institutions. It also exports its products and technologies to approximately 30 countries. Karel Elektronik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KFEIN.IS.summary: Kafein Yazilim Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S. provides various software solutions and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers application development, test/test automation, project management, turn-key software solution, consultancy, managed, and outsourcing services. It also provides data analysis and data mining services primarily BSS support business support system and data archiving services, as well as data management and system integration services. The company serves telecom firms, insurance companies, banks, organizations, and retail and manufacturing companies. Kafein Yazilim Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2005 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KRONT.IS.summary: Kron TelekomÃ¼nikasyon Hizmetleri A.S. provides technology solutions for the operational productivity and security needs of the corporates in the finance, energy, healthcare, and telecommunications sectors worldwide. It offers privileged access management, including Single Connect products, privileged session and password management, multi-factor authentication, database access management and logging, privileged task automation, TACAS+/RADIUS access management, and database masking. The company also provides Single Monitor products, including network and IT infrastructure performance management, configuration management, network traffic analysis, alarm and event management, and automatic discovery modules. In addition, it offers subscription verification and authorization, traffic logging services, network monitoring and service quality measurement, and cloud based wireless networking services. Kron TelekomÃ¼nikasyon Hizmetleri A.S. was founded in 2007 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

LINK.IS.long_name: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LINK.IS.summary: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a software development company in Turkey. The company develops integrated business application software that covers various accounting, production, and commercial operational requirements. Its software products include modules for tracking sales, marketing, purchasing, inventory management, warehouse-store management, current accounts, finance, accounting, production, budget planning, human resources, and fixed assets operations. The company also offers sales and after sales training, and support services through a network of approximately 500 authorized resellers and dealers. It distributes its products through distributor and business partner companies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

LOGO.IS.long_name: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LOGO.IS.summary: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. develops software solutions in Turkey and internationally. It develops ERP solutions, such as j-Platform, a business management solution; Tiger 3 Enterprise and Netsis 3 Enterprise, which are ERP software products; Tiger 3, a corporate and operational solution to enterprises operating in sales, distribution, and service fields; and Netsis 3 Standard for end-to-end management of internal processes in the company. The company also offers SME solutions comprising GO 3 that enhances the business processes; Netsis 3 Entegre, a software; Mali Musavir Plus, an account software; and Start, a solution to manage inventory, cost, cash, invoicing, order, bank, and customer information, as well as project solutions, including treasury management, data collection and reporting, and B2B systems. In addition, it provides business analytics solutions, including Logo Mind Insight, a real-time reporting solution; Logo Mind Navigator, a reporting solution; and Logo Mind Budget, a budget management solution, as well as human resources solutions, such as j-HR, Tiger HR, Payroll Plus, Netsis HR, and Netsis 3 Bordro. Further, the company offers supply chain solutions, which comprise Logo Ocean, Logo Neon, and Logo Mobile Sales; integrated products, such as Logo Connect Bank, Logo Connect B2B, Netsis B2B, Logo Connect FDA, Go Garanti, and Turkcell Services for integrating data on Logo program that with internal/external software programs; and workflow management solutions. Additionally, it provides retail cloud solutions; CRM solutions; and e-government solutions, such as e-invoice, e-ledger, e-archive, and e-reconciliation solutions. The company serves distribution, machine and automotive spare part, packaging, retail, cement-glass-steel, furniture, telecom-information and communication, tourism, and textile sectors. Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.

NETAS.IS.summary: Netas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. provides solutions in information and communication technologies in Turkey and internationally. The company operates Enterprise, Public, International, Technology, Telecom, and BDH segments. It manufactures and trades in telecommunication equipment; and provides project installation services, technical support, repair and maintenance services, IT, strategic outsourcing, implementation, and related services. The company offers solutions to its customers in core competencies, including mobile broadband, cyber security, cloud computing, business applications, and big data. It also offers end-to-end value added solutions, such as technology consulting and after-sales support services in countries, such as Bangladesh, Pakistan, and Nepal in the Asia-Pacific; Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan in the Turkic Republics; Tunisia, Algeria, and Morocco in North Africa; and Saudi Arabia. The company serves financial institutions and telecommunication service providers; public and public security, energy, sports and entertainment, retail and fast consumption, and transport industries; and smart campuses and buildings. Netas TelekomÃ¼nikasyon A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

RCAA.SG.summary: ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, sells, services, imports, and exports consumer durable goods and consumer electronics in Turkey and internationally. It operates through White Goods, Consumer Electronics, and Other segments. The company offers built-in and freestanding appliances, such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, hobs, hoods, warming drawers, microwave ovens, and water dispensers and water filtration appliances; and small household appliances, including vacuum and steam cleaners, kitchen appliances, personal and garment care appliances, and fans. It also provides consumer electronics comprising TVs, smart phones, notebooks and tablets, POS cash registers, Hi-Fi systems, and portable audio systems; and heating and ventilation systems consisting of air conditioners, boilers, and water and room heaters. In addition, the company offers components, which include hermetic compressors, industrial motors, and appliances motor-pumps. It offers its products under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Blomberg, Arctic, Grundig, Altus, Flavel, Elektrabregenz, Leisure, Defy, and Dawlance brand names. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. ArÃ§elik Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of KoÃ§ Holding A.S.

SMART.IS.summary: Smartiks Yazilim A.S. provides software development and consulting services. The company offers Oracle Human Resources, Oracle Siebel CRM, Oracle customer experience, corporate software development, The Internet of Things, and SmartXperience solutions. It serves health, insurance, banking and finance, retail, automotive, public, and telecom sectors. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TKCN.MX.summary: Turkcell Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S. provides digital services in Turkey, Ukraine, Belarus, Azerbaijan, Cyprus, Germany, and the Netherlands. It operates in two segments, Turkcell Turkey and Turkcell International. It offers voice services, such as mobile communication and fixed voice for consumers and corporate customers; and broadband services, including mobile broadband, fiber to the home/building and ADSL Docsis, cable, LTE, and fixed wireless broadband. The company also provides BiP, an integrated IP-based communication platform; TV+, which enables subscribers to watch live television channels and on-demand video content; fizy, a digital music platform; Lifebox, a cloud service for data storage; Dergilik, a digital publishing platform; Yaani, a search engine application; Digital Operator, an application for its customers to track their bills and usage, change their account settings, and make transactions and purchases; Goals on Your Mobile that allows update on game scores and player transfers; Turkcell Academy that provides digital learning contents and services; UpCall, a call management service; Kopilot that connects cars to smartphones and enables real-time monitoring of metrics on the vehicle's performance; and Supercam, which ensures the safety of the home and workplace. In addition, it offers digital business services and solutions, such as digital business infrastructure, digital business applications, managed services, cloud, IoT products and solution management, big data and analytics services, business insights and analytics, location based services, hospital information systems, and techfin services. Further, the company provides international roaming, and wholesale voice and data services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 12.4 million prepaid subscribers and 20.4 million postpaid subscribers. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

VESBE.IS.long_name: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
VESBE.IS.summary: Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures electronics and household appliances in Turkey, Europe, and internationally. The company produces refrigerators, room air conditioning units, washing machines, cookers, dishwashers, water heaters, freezers, and dryers. It also exports its products to 156 countries. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Beyaz Esya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

VESTL.IS.long_name: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
VESTL.IS.summary: Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells brown and white goods in Turkey. The company operates through three segments: Television and Electronic Devices, White Goods, and Other. The company provides refrigerators, washing machines, tumble dryers, cookers, ovens, water heaters, dishwashers, and air-conditioners. It also offers televisions; set-top boxes (STB); visual solutions; smartphones and tablets; LED lighting; smart home, smart walking stick, smart mirror, integrated television STB, smart test platform, user experience and interface cloud architecture, artificial intelligence, and cyber security solutions; and electric vehicle charging stations. The company markets and sells its products under the Vestel brand name. It sells its products through 976 Vestel stores, 886 Regal sales points, 9 Vs outlets, and online sales stores, as well as through household stores, technology retailers, hypermarkets, and e-commerce sites. The company also exports its products to Europe and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Vestel Elektronik Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Zorlu Holding A.S.
